metadata.description: Two of Spider-Man's deadliest foes, Hobgoblin and Carnage, take center stage -- as heroes! In the wake of AXIS, Roderick Kingsley, the original Hobgoblin, is back in the suit and back in New York with a new mission: to make YOU the best you can be! But when Phil Urich, the former Hobgoblin, tries to get rid of Kingsley for good, will the heroic Hobgoblin be forced to revert to his wicked ways? Meanwhile, if symbiotic serial killer Carnage has given up villainy, then why has he kidnapped one of New York City's most beloved news anchors? The Sin-Eater returns, with a surprising mission -- and if all this isn't enough for Carnage to worry about, he's still on the authorities' most-wanted list! The effects of AXIS continue in this surprising saga -- don't miss it!
metadata.name: Axis: Carnage & Hobgoblin
